title: Mother's Finest - Mother's Finest (First two albums, 1973+1976;
description:
Great '70s Funk Rock from Georgia

To confuse & amuse - the first two albums of Mother's Finest are both titled Mother's Finest - both are included on this 2010 reissue (Wounded Bird Records)


'Mother's Finest' released in 1972 (RCA Records) was a nice funk album, but sold poorly. Songs for a second album were recorded 1973 but not released - both albums are on CD1 of this reissue

CD2 - 'MOTHER'S FINEST' released 1976 (Epic Records) was a real highlight - the hottest stuff you could get at this time. We never noticed, that it was not their 'real' debut album - because for most of us the history of 'Mother's Finest' starts with 'Fire' on this album....
The 2010 reissue contains one 1977 bonus song on CD2
